TITLE: VENUE
DESCRIPTION: 35 MPG Hwyi

TITLE: Get in. Get after it.
DESCRIPTION: Unapologetically small, agile and not fragile, the first-ever Venue shoulders its way to the front of the line. Chiseled angles and fresh style. Tech that’s got people talking and safety that checks all the boxes. Venue brings them all together with city smarts and can-do attitude.

TITLE: Featuring the Venue Denim
DESCRIPTION: Your complete guided tour, inside and out.

TITLE: Streaming tommorow 8am to 12pm PST
DESCRIPTION: Our live Q&A show on all things Venue

TITLE: Compare 3 VENUE trims

TITLE: It’s got all the right moves.
DESCRIPTION: The first-ever Venue takes to the streets like a boss, getting you from meetings to meet-ups with confidence and ease. With safety that looks out for you when distractions abound. Fast-moving tech that keeps up with you. And standout style that looks good uptown and downtown.

TITLE: Urban Exploration
DESCRIPTION: All kinds of advanced monitoring make for an extra safety lookout, know what’s in your blind spot, stay in your lane, and avoid potential collisions.

TITLE: Fresh, forward, fierce.
DESCRIPTION: With its wide stance and unflinching profile, the new kid on the block’s got a style all its own. Venue puts a bold face forward with its signature cascading grille, available LED headlights and Daytime Running Lights. And it doesn’t stop there. Great style continues with smart, fresh design inside, too.

TITLE: Get a grip.
DESCRIPTION: Drive Mode Select lets you choose normal, sport or snow mode. So when the slippery stuff starts coming down, choose Snow Mode with advanced traction control for optimized driving in bad weather.

TITLE: For the life that’s always on.
DESCRIPTION: Venue’s got the tech to make you feel like you’re tackling everything at once. With safety features that have your back from every angle. Connections for your phone that power you on and a touchscreen that shows you everything you need to keep moving forward. It’s all here and it’s on.

TITLE: Technology
DESCRIPTION: Get to your favorite mobile apps safely from your touchscreen.*

TITLE: Cool, Classic Denim.
DESCRIPTION:
The versatile and nimble Venue Denim edition is a 
							special combination of features including contrasting 
							blue with white accents, 17-inch alloy wheels and 
							a striking interior denim/leatherette combo.

TITLE: KONA Electric
DESCRIPTION: Introducing the world's first zero-emission subcompact SUV, with an incredible EPA-estimated range of 258 miles. 2019 Kona Electric, winner, 2019 North American Utility Vehicle of the Year™*

TITLE: Rear Cross-Traffic Collision Warning (RCCW)*
DESCRIPTION:
Helps you back out of a parking space or driveway by detecting traffic coming from either side of the rear of your
								vehicle and provides an audible warning.

TITLE: Forward Collision-Avoidance Assist (FCA)*
DESCRIPTION:
The moment it detects a slowing or stopped vehicle or a pedestrian in your path, it warns you of a potential
								collision. If you don't stop in time, the system will automatically apply emergency braking to help avoid or reduce the severity
								of a collision.

TITLE: Driver Attention Warning (DAW)*
DESCRIPTION:
Continuously monitors your driving patterns to detect drowsy or inattentive driving. Once detected, it alerts the
								driver with a sound cue coupled with a warning message on the instrument panel.

TITLE: Blind-Spot Collision Warning (BCW)*
DESCRIPTION:
This system notifies you with a visual alert when its radars detect a vehicle in the driver's blind spot area. If
								you try to change lanes in this situation, an audio warning will sound.

TITLE: Lane Keeping Assist (LKA)*
DESCRIPTION:
This intelligent system warns you through audio and visual cues if your vehicle drifts out of its driving lane
								without signaling. If necessary, it will gently apply corrective steering assistance to keep you inside the lane.

TITLE: Smart Cruise Control (SCC)*
DESCRIPTION: When it detects a vehicle in your lane ahead, it automatically slows your vehicle down while maintaining a safe distance with the vehicle ahead, and can even bring your Kona to a complete stop without driver input.

TITLE: High Beam Assist (HBA)
DESCRIPTION:
This thoughtful system shares your safety with others. It automatically senses oncoming traffic and dims your high
								beam headlights.

TITLE: Compare 6 Tucson trims
DESCRIPTION: 2.0L GDI 4-cylinderengine

TITLE: Exterior tour
DESCRIPTION: Available Surround View Monitor gives you expanded vision that sees all around you with 360-degree views from the front, rear, sides and above.

TITLE: Interior tour
DESCRIPTION: Safely access mobile apps via voice or touchscreen with Apple CarPlay® or Android Auto™. Plus, available 8-inch navigation has a Rear View Monitor for easy parking.

TITLE: Expansive space, high-end details.
DESCRIPTION: The moment it detects a slowing or stopped vehicle or a pedestrian in your path, it warns you of a potential collision. If you don’t stop in time, the system will automatically apply emergency braking to help avoid or reduce the severity of a collision.

TITLE: Safe Exit Assist (SEA)*
DESCRIPTION: This pioneering innovation prevents your passengers from stepping onto the road when its radar detects a vehicle approaching from behind. If necessary, it will override attempts to deactivate the Electronic Child Safety Lock until it's safe for your child to open the door.

TITLE: Forward Collision-Avoidance Assist with Pedestrian Detection*
DESCRIPTION: Always on the lookout for potential collisions, this standard feature warns you when approaching a slowing or stopped vehicle or pedestrian, and brakes if necessary, to avoid impact.

TITLE: Available Blind-Spot Collision Avoidance Assist (BCA)*
DESCRIPTION: Gives you greater awareness of traffic around your vehicle by providing audible and visual alerts if a vehicle is detected in the driver's blind spot.

TITLE: Lane Keeping Assist (LKA)*
DESCRIPTION: Drift outside your lane without signaling and this available system may apply corrective steering assistance to help keep your vehicle in its lane.

TITLE: High Beam Assist (HBA)
DESCRIPTION: This thoughtful system shares your safety with others. It automatically senses oncoming traffic and dims your high beam headlights.

TITLE: Driver Attention Warning (DAW)*
DESCRIPTION: It acts like a digital co-pilot, analyzing driving patterns using vehicle data such as steering angle, steering torque and vehicle position in the traffic lane as you drive. If the system detects driver fatigue or inattention, it presents an audible tone or visual alert on the instrument panel.

TITLE: Smart Cruise Control (SCC) with stop/start*
DESCRIPTION: When it detects a vehicle in your lane ahead, it automatically slows your vehicle down while maintaining a safe distance with the vehicle ahead, and can even bring your Santa Fe to a complete stop without driver input.

TITLE: Rear Cross-Traffic Collision-Avoidance Assist (RCCA)*
DESCRIPTION: When you’re going in reverse, it lets you know if its sensors detect a vehicle approaching from the left or right. It will even apply the brakes automatically if needed.

TITLE: Rear Occupant Alert (ROA)*
DESCRIPTION: As the engine is turned off, a visual warning in the instrument cluster reminds you to check the rear seats before exiting.

TITLE: Ultrasonic Rear Occupant Alert (Ultrasonic ROA)*
DESCRIPTION: As the engine is turned off, a visual warning in the instrument cluster reminds you to check the rear seats before exiting. Additionally, overhead ultrasonic sensors monitor the backseat area to minimize the risk of a child or pet accidentally being left inside after the vehicle is parked and locked. If sensors detect movement, the horn will honk, lights will flash and your smartphone will receive an alert through Blue Link®.

TITLE: Compare 3 Palisade trims

TITLE: Life, big, bold and beautiful.
DESCRIPTION: Is it extravagance? Or necessity? Either way, Palisade's fresh sense of style presents the rare luxury of a different perspective. This is how you celebrate a big, beautiful life.

TITLE: Full-on digital. All-out modern.

The sleek modern digital look is one thing. Simple functionality is everything else.
						Take a look at the smartest tech to travel with, Palisade has it all.

TITLE: The possibilities are endless.
DESCRIPTION: You can do it all. Weekend camping. Ski trips. Soccer practice, ballet and shopping. Near or far, weather or not, the well-equipped Palisade is engineered rock-solid to take you there.

TITLE: Versatility
DESCRIPTION: Confidence comes along on every trip. With available HTRAC All Wheel Drive, Palisade gives you the traction to weather every storm, terrain and all kinds of road conditions.

TITLE: 3 doors. 1 of a kind.
DESCRIPTION: When it comes to its unique exterior, the Veloster pushes theenvelope even further with a sportier, more aggressive design.

TITLE: Geek out inside.
DESCRIPTION: We ramped up the tech performance with an array ofnext-gen infotainment and connectivity features.

TITLE: A driver-driven interior.
DESCRIPTION: We completely revamped the interior with acabin that's more driver-focused and modern.

TITLE: Handle with flair.
DESCRIPTION: The Veloster doesn't just look different, it feels different – especiallywhen you're ripping it around hairpin turns and tight corners.

TITLE: Forward Collision-Avoidance Assist (FCA)*
DESCRIPTION: The moment its camera sensors detect a potential collision directly ahead, the system alerts the driver and automatically activates the brakes.Even better, Pedestrian Detection, a lookout that warns for pedestrians in your path, is also available on Turbo Ultimate.

TITLE: Driver Attention Warning (DAW)*
DESCRIPTION: This safety innovation warns you with audio and visual cues if it detects drowsy or other kinds of inattentive driving behavior.

TITLE: Blind-Spot Collision Warning (BCW)*
DESCRIPTION: Your Hyundai notifies you with a visual alert when its radars detect a vehicle in your blind spot area. If you try to change lanes in this situation, an audio warning will sound.

TITLE: Lane Keeping Assist (LKA)*
DESCRIPTION: In case of an unintended lane departure at higher speeds, it warns the driver and—when necessary—guides the car back to a safer position.

TITLE: Smart Cruise Control with Stop & Go (SCC)*
DESCRIPTION: While traveling at a speed set by you, it uses radars to maintain a safe distance from the car ahead. When your Hyundai slows down to 6 mph or less, the cruise control automatically turns off.

TITLE: Rear Cross-Traffic Collision Warning (RCCW)*
DESCRIPTION: To help make reversing safer—especially when you're backing out of a parking space with limited visibility—the Rear Cross-Traffic Collision Warning lets you know if its sensors detect a vehicle approaching from the left or right.

DESCRIPTION: Awards and accolades show how we make driving safer, more convenient and ultimately more rewarding.

TITLE: 2020 IONIQ Hybrid
DESCRIPTION: 59 MPG Hwyi

TITLE: The most fuel-efficientcar in America.
DESCRIPTION: It doesn’t look or drive like one, but it’s most definitely a hybrid. With Ioniq Hybrid Blue trim getting up to 59 MPG Highway, it’s America’s most fuel-efficient hybrid, beating Prius.* It’s also the most spacious, with smart tech and brilliant styling.

TITLE: Compare 4IONIQ Hybrid trims
DESCRIPTION: gas/electriccombined

TITLE: More style per gallon.
DESCRIPTION: Ioniq’s design approach is hybrid efficiency minus the eccentricity. You can see it in the bold, airflow-inspired form and lines—made all the more striking with new styling features.

TITLE: Design
DESCRIPTION: Distinctive LED lights available in the front and back improve both night vision and efficiency while keeping Ioniq looking as stylish as ever.

TITLE: Modern space. The most in its class.
DESCRIPTION: Ioniq has room. Lots of it. Stretch out in this stylish space with eye-catching upgrades like an available 10.25-inch touchscreen, ambient lighting and sporty flat-bottom steering wheel. Or load it up with friends and gear for the weekend.

TITLE: Interior
DESCRIPTION: Lots of space means loads of comfort, especially with available options like a power driver with lumbar support, heated front seats and leather seating surfaces.

TITLE: Make more of every trip.
DESCRIPTION: If there’s a way to keep you moving and connected while you’re on the go, it’s this. Thoughtful advances that make every journey easier.

TITLE: Convenient and connected
DESCRIPTION: Power up Qi-compatible devices on the available charging pad, clutter-free, no wires needed. Plus, passengers can easily charge up with available 2nd-row USB ports.

SECTION: A battery warranty that goes the distance.
TITLE: A battery warranty that goes the distance.
DESCRIPTION: We want you to be confident in what we make—especially our high-capacity lithium-ion polymer battery system. Which is why it’s guaranteed for 10 years/100,000 miles.*

SECTION: Looking for electric? Ioniq’s got that, too.
TITLE: Looking for electric? Ioniq’s got that, too.
DESCRIPTION: Limited availability in select states*

SECTION: Electric when you want it.Gas when you need it.
TITLE: Electric when you want it.Gas when you need it.

A combined battery and gas range of up to 630 miles?* Check. Option of driving in all-electric mode? Check. 
					Special access to HOV lanes? Check. When it comes to perks, Ioniq Plug-in Hybrid’s a stylish way of checking all of the above.

TITLE: Compare 3 IONIQ Plug-in Hybrid trims
DESCRIPTION: gas/electriccombined

TITLE: The best of both fuels.
DESCRIPTION: The range and fueling convenience of a hybrid combined with the amazing benefits of an EV—when you think about it, driving a plug-in hybrid is a smart choice.

TITLE: federal tax credit
DESCRIPTION: And additional state incentives may apply.*

TITLE: all-electric miles. 52 MPG.

TITLE: Save on fuel, not style.
DESCRIPTION: With Ioniq, looks can get you pretty far. The sweeping contours and lines lower the drag coefficient, while its revamped styling features raise its curb appeal.

TITLE: Design
DESCRIPTION: We’ve upgraded the refined exterior with more modern touches like the handsome mesh-pattern grille, resculpted bumpers and sportier new wheels.

TITLE: Modern sophistication on full display.
DESCRIPTION: Perched atop the instrument panel, the available 10.25-inch touchscreen serves as the vibrant hub of the interior. The contemporary styling is further enhanced with ambient lighting and a sporty flat-bottom steering wheel.

TITLE: Interior
DESCRIPTION: Use your favorite mobile apps safely and seamlessly through your touchscreen and voice.

TITLE: A space as flexible as its power.
DESCRIPTION: The roomy Ioniq has more passenger space than Toyota Prius Prime, Chevy Volt and Nissan Leaf.* And the 60/40 split-folding rear seatback gives you flexible seating and cargo arrangements, taking full advantage of the 23.0 cu. ft. of cargo volume.

TITLE: Electric made effortless.
DESCRIPTION: Driving electric is easier than you think. Especially with these innovations that save time and money.

TITLE: Easy Charging
DESCRIPTION: Charging time

TITLE: 2 hours, 15 minutes with a 220V/240V outlet.
DESCRIPTION: Or charge under 9 hours at home with a standard 110V/120V outlet.

TITLE: Capture electricity while braking.
DESCRIPTION: Ioniq’s brakes convert the wheels’ mechanical energy into electricity and store it in the battery.

TITLE: NEXO
DESCRIPTION: 380 miles*

SECTION: A future where alternative fuel is normal fuel.
TITLE: A future where alternative fuel is normal fuel.
DESCRIPTION:
Introducing the first-ever Nexo Fuel Cell. It's not only the world's first dedicated
						hydrogen-powered SUV, its EPA-estimated range of 380 miles is the highest of any fuel-cell or electric vehicle on
						the market. But more than a clean energy vehicle, the Nexo is our technology flagship, featuring next-generation
						connectivity, safety, design, and luxury.

SECTION: Up to 380 milesof range in just5 minutes.*
TITLE: Hydrogen Innovation
DESCRIPTION:
Fueling the Nexo is just as easy as pumping gas. And in five minutes or less of refueling, you
							have the highest range of any fuel-cell or electric vehicle on the planet. Enough to drive from L.A. to San
							Francisco nonstop.* This is the beauty offuel-cell technology.

TITLE: Autonomous Parking
DESCRIPTION:
The Nexo is the first Hyundai to feature Remote Smart Parking Assist, which has the distinction of being our first fully autonomous feature.
							With just a push of a Smart Key button, this amazing system transforms into your own personal valet, parking your Nexo for you.
							When you’re ready to go, RSPA drives the Nexo out of the spot.

TITLE: Ownership Benefits
DESCRIPTION: The only emission produced by hydrogen fuel cells is H2O.

TITLE: A design as clean as its energy.
DESCRIPTION: Every aesthetic element of the Nexo was designed to be as clean and pure as its fuel source. And because a low drag coefficient increases range, it was designed to be highly aerodynamic as well.

TITLE: Get an inside view of tomorrow.
DESCRIPTION: Enter a cockpit inspired by the future. Inside you’ll experience an elevated level of ultra-modern luxury and technology befitting a forward-thinking flagship.

TITLE: An effortless blend of technology and versatility.
DESCRIPTION: Rooted in innovation, the Nexo makes life easier with a number of intelligent and intuitive technology conveniences you’ve come to expect.

TITLE: Fuel cell explained
DESCRIPTION:
When you drive, the hydrogen travels from the tanks to the fuel-cell stack. There it goes through an electrochemical reaction with
								 oxygen collected from the air intake. This creates electricity, which powers the motor, and water.

TITLE: Lane Following Assist (LFA)*
DESCRIPTION: Another all-new innovation for Hyundai, Lane Following Assist automatically adjusts steering to make sure the vehicle is safely inside the lane. It also uses its sensors to maintain the proper speed to keep a safe distance from the car ahead.

TITLE: Forward Collision-Avoidance Assist (FCA)*
DESCRIPTION: The moment it detects a slowing or stopped vehicle in your path, it warns you of a potential collision. If you don't stop in time, the system will automatically apply emergency braking to help avoid or reduce the severity of a collision.FCA with Pedestrian DetectionFor models with this safety enhancement, the forward camera and radar can also detect pedestrians in your path and activate the same warning and – if necessary – automatic braking.

TITLE: Driver Attention Warning (DAW)*
DESCRIPTION: To help prevent potential accidents, this system monitors your driving patterns to detect drowsy or inattentive driving. Once detected, it alerts you with a sound cue coupled with a warning message on the instrument panel.

TITLE: Blind-Spot Collision Warning (BCW)*
DESCRIPTION: Your Hyundai notifies you with a visual alert when its radars detect a vehicle in your blind spot area. If you try to change lanes in this situation, an audio warning will sound.

TITLE: High Beam Assist (HBA)*
DESCRIPTION: Constantly turning your high beams off and on can be a hassle, which is why this thoughtful feature automatically does it for you. It can detect oncoming vehicles and also, when they're no longer there, toggling between high and low beams accordingly.

TITLE: Smart Cruise Control (SCC)*
DESCRIPTION: While traveling at a speed set by you, it uses radars to maintain a safe distance from the car ahead. When your Hyundai slows down to 6 mph or less, the cruise control automatically turns off.

TITLE: Rear Cross-Traffic Collision Warning (RCCW)*
DESCRIPTION: To help make reversing safer—especially when you're backing out of a parking space with limited visibility—the Rear Cross-Traffic Collision Warning lets you know if its sensors detect a vehicle approaching from the left or right.

TITLE: Remote Smart Parking Assist*
DESCRIPTION: Our autonomous system allows the Hyundai to park itself, even when you’re not inside the vehicle. Once you get out, the self-parking function can be started with a push of your smart key button. You can also summon the car out of its parking spot the same way. With an innovation like this, the future feels even less remote.

TITLE: Longer range. More power. Bigger screen.
DESCRIPTION: With an EPA-estimated range of 170 miles* and 134 HP, the revamped Ioniq Electric takes you farther and quicker than before. And the new interior makes the journey more enjoyable with a bigger 10.25-inch touchscreen and ambient lighting. It’s a beautiful way to join an inspiring era of automotive evolution.

SECTION: Meet the rest of the family.
TITLE: Meet the rest of the family.
DESCRIPTION: The most fuel-efficient car in America.

TITLE: The hybrid, gorgeously reimagined.
DESCRIPTION: The completely renewed Sonata Hybrid changes the way you look at hybrids, starting with its dramatic sports coupe silhouette. Even the LED lights astonish, beautifully integrated with the chrome trim, hidden until they illuminate. Inside, sleek accommodations indulge the senses with upscale features. If it wasn't for its roughly 680 miles of range*, you just might forget it's a hybrid. And because it's a Hyundai, it comes with 3 years of complimentary maintenance*.

TITLE: Free energy, compliments of the sun.
DESCRIPTION: When it comes to maximizing efficiency, the sky's no longer the limit - it's where Sonata Hybrid gets free power. The available roof solar panels charge the batteries, generating enough electric power to increase driving range by nearly 2 miles every day. You could get the equivalent of as much as 700 extra miles of battery power per year.*

SECTION: A refined vision of the future.
TITLE: A refined vision of the future.
DESCRIPTION: As beautiful as it looks, Sonata Hybrid is loaded with next-level technology that's just as stunning.

TITLE: A bolder breed of hybrid.
DESCRIPTION: The reasons to drive a hybrid used to be purely practical then came the Sonata Hybrid. From the aggressive, new face with its imaginative lighting to the rear fastback styling with its exclusive spoiler, it dares to do what hybrids have never done before: stand out.
